node.title: NT police use pepper spray on protestors, arrest 7, at anti-vaccine rally in Darwin
node.description: Hundreds of protesters demonstrating against mandatory vaccines clash with NT police, who use capsicum spray to disperse them during a standoff in Darwin.
node.content:
["Hundreds of protesters demonstrating against mandatory vaccines have clashed with NT police, who used capsicum spray to disperse them\u00a0during a standoff in\u00a0Darwin.\u00a0", "Police were outnumbered as about 500 protestors\u00a0forced their way through a blockade at the intersection of East Point road and Goyder road, near the CBD, just after 3:30pm.\u00a0", "The protestors met just after midday\u00a0at\u00a0Casuarina Beach\u00a0and made their way into the city in a convoy of cars, despite warnings from authorities.\u00a0", "As they approached the fringes of the city, protesters continued on foot.\u00a0", "Northern Territory Police officers used pepper spray to disperse the rally, where most protestors\u00a0appeared not to be wearing masks.\u00a0", "Seven people have been arrested, according to police.\u00a0", "A number of roadblocks were established on the\u00a0Stuart Highway, Tiger Brennan Drive and Gilruth Avenue.\u00a0", "", "
Protestors were drenched in pepper spray as the rally turned violent.\u00a0(ABC News: Michael Franchi)
", "Northern Territory Police Commander Jamie Chalker issued a warning to demonstrators at a press conference this morning.", "\u201cLeaving home to go to a protest is not one of the five reasons for an unvaccinated individual to leave home,\u201d he said.", "Mr Chalker said \"commensurate resources\" were on standby to respond to any large-scale demonstrations.", "\"We always know within these types of groups that there might be a very small minority within that don't necessarily seek to accord with the generalist view of what the movement is all about.\"", "The Greater Darwin region was plunged into its first 72-hour 'lockout' on\u00a0Friday, after a man in his 20s tested positive for coronavirus.\u00a0", "", "
Hundreds of people, many of whom were not wearing masks, charged police lines on East Point road, near the Darwin High School.\u00a0(ABC News: Michael Franchi)
", "Under the lockout rules, people who have received both vaccinations are able to go about their lives as normal, but must wear a mask.\u00a0", "However, people who have not been vaccinated are subject to lockdown rules, and can only leave the house for five essential reasons.", "The Northern Territory's outbreak has grown to three after a\u00a0second\u00a0positive COVID case,\u00a0an unvaccinated\u00a055-year-old man,\u00a0was detected in Katherine and a\u00a021-year old woman who arrived in Darwin from Cairns on Friday, also tested positive.\u00a0", "The protest is expected to culminate in a gathering in front of Parliament House.\u00a0", "Northern Territory Police will be providing further comments at a press conference later\u00a0today."]
